title: Michigan School Shooting Suspect Identified as 15-Year-Old Sophomore
sub_head: Prosecutors say the teen faces first-degree murder and terrorism charges, as a fourth student dies
body:
The 15-year-old suspect who police say opened fire at his Michigan high school Tuesday, killing four students and injuring seven others, has been identified as Ethan Crumbley, a sophomore at the school.
Karen D. McDonald, the Oakland County prosecutor, said on Wednesday the teen is being charged with first-degree murder and terrorism in connection with Tuesdayâ€™s mass shooting at Oxford High School, located about 40 miles north of Detroit.
